author: afiqaize
body:
#### PR description:

Code changes address https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/35036

Problem is caused by function being called with brem = nan. Did not investigate why this is happening.

Also took the chance to improve the readability of the parameter arrays, and removed a redundant logic.

#### PR validation:

Code compiles, and checked that the block that triggered UB is no longer reached with nan calls.
title: address UB in EnergyUncertaintyPhotonSpecific.cc
